statements: SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM InsurancePolicy;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM InsurancePolicy;
SELECT AVG(premium_amount) FROM InsurancePolicy;
SELECT policy_holder_name, SUM(premium_amount) AS total_premium FROM InsurancePolicy GROUP BY policy_holder_name;
SELECT policy_holder_name, COUNT(*) AS num_policies FROM InsurancePolicy GROUP BY policy_holder_name;
SELECT policy_holder_name, MAX(premium_amount) AS max_premium FROM InsurancePolicy GROUP BY policy_holder_name;
SELECT policy_holder_name, MIN(premium_amount) AS min_premium FROM InsurancePolicy GROUP BY policy_holder_name;
SELECT policy_holder_name, AVG(premium_amount) AS avg_premium FROM InsurancePolicy GROUP BY policy_holder_name;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE premium_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012';
SELECT * FROM policy;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM policy WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, end_date FROM policy WHERE policy_type = 'Car Insurance';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_id FROM policy WHERE policy_type = 'Health Insurance';
SELECT * FROM policy WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM claim WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, start_date FROM policy WHERE policy_holder_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM claim WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM policy WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, status FROM claim WHERE status <> 'Rejected';
SELECT * FROM claim WHERE claim_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_id FROM policy WHERE policy_type = 'Travel Insurance';
SELECT * FROM claim WHERE claim_amount < 500;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM policy WHERE policy_holder_id = 456;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim WHERE claim_amount < 50;
SELECT policy_id, end_date FROM policy WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, status FROM claim WHERE status = 'Processing';
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM policy WHERE policy_holder_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolder;
SELECT id, name, age FROM PolicyHolder WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceCompany;
SELECT company_name, location FROM InsuranceCompany WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM Policy;
SELECT policy_id, holder_id, start_date, end_date FROM Policy WHERE premium > 500;
SELECT ph.name, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON p.holder_id = ph.id;
SELECT ic.company_name, p.policy_id, p.premium FROM Policy p JOIN InsuranceCompany ic ON p.company_id = ic.company_id;
SELECT ph.name, ic.company_name FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON p.holder_id = ph.id JOIN InsuranceCompany ic ON p.company_id = ic.company_id;
SELECT ph.name, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.premium FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON p.holder_id = ph.id WHERE ph.age < 50;
SELECT ic.company_name, p.policy_id, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM Policy p JOIN InsuranceCompany ic ON p.company_id = ic.company_id WHERE ic.location='California';

SELECT ph.name, ic.company_name, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON p.holder_id = ph.id JOIN InsuranceCompany ic ON p.company_id = ic.company_id WHERE ph.age < 40 AND ic.location='Texas';
SELECT ph.name, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.premium FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON p.holder_id = ph.id WHERE p.premium < 1000;
SELECT ic.company_name, p.policy_id, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM Policy p JOIN InsuranceCompany ic ON p.company_id = ic.company_id WHERE p.premium > 2000;

SELECT ph.name, ic.company_name, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.premium FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON p.holder_id = ph.id JOIN InsuranceCompany ic ON p.company_id = ic.company_id WHERE ph.age < 50 AND p.premium < 1500;
SELECT ph.name, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.premium FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON p.holder_id = ph.id WHERE p.start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ic.company_name, p.policy_id, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM Policy p JOIN InsuranceCompany ic ON p.company_id = ic.company_id WHERE p.end_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT ph.name, ic.company_name, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON p.holder_id = ph.id JOIN InsuranceCompany ic ON p.company_id = ic.company_id WHERE ph.age < 40 AND p.end_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT ph.name, ic.company_name, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.premium FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON p.holder_id = ph.id JOIN InsuranceCompany ic ON p.company_id = ic.company_id WHERE ph.age < 50 AND p.start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ph.name, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.premium FROM Policy p JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON p.holder_id = ph.id WHERE ph.name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT id, name, email FROM policyholders;
SELECT * FROM policies;
SELECT policy_id, policyholder_id, policy_type, policy_amount FROM policies;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_amount, status FROM claims;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_id, name, email, phone_number FROM agents;
SELECT * FROM policyholders, policies WHERE policyholders.id = policies.policyholder_id;
SELECT name, policy_type, policy_amount FROM policyholders, policies WHERE policyholders.id = policies.policyholder_id;
SELECT * FROM policyholders, policies, claims WHERE policies.policy_id = claims.policy_id;
SELECT name, claim_amount, status FROM policyholders, policies, claims WHERE policies.policy_id = claims.policy_id AND policyholders.id = policies.policyholder_id;
SELECT * FROM policyholders, policies, agents WHERE policies.policyholder_id = policyholders.id AND agents.agent_id = policies.policyholder_id;
SELECT name, policy_type, phone_number FROM policyholders, policies, agents WHERE policies.policyholder_id = policyholders.id AND agents.agent_id = policies.policyholder_id;
SELECT * FROM policyholders JOIN policies ON policyholders.id = policies.policyholder_id;
SELECT name, policy_type, policy_amount FROM policyholders JOIN policies ON policyholders.id = policies.policyholder_id;
SELECT * FROM policies JOIN claims ON policies.policy_id = claims.policy_id;
SELECT policy_type, claim_amount, status FROM policies JOIN claims ON policies.policy_id = claims.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM policies JOIN agents ON policies.policyholder_id = agents.agent_id;
SELECT policy_type, phone_number, email FROM policies JOIN agents ON policies.policyholder_id = agents.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers
SELECT name, email FROM Customers
SELECT id, name, email, phone FROM Customers
SELECT * FROM Policies
SELECT policy_number, policy_type FROM Policies
SELECT id, policy_number, policy_type, customer_id FROM Policies
SELECT * FROM Claims
SELECT claim_number, date, amount FROM Claims
SELECT id, claim_number, date, amount, customer_id FROM Claims
SELECT * FROM Agents
SELECT name, email FROM Agents
SELECT id, name, email, phone FROM Agents
SELECT * FROM Agency
SELECT name, region FROM Agency
SELECT id, name, region, agent_id FROM Agency
SELECT Customers.name, Policies.policy_number, Claims.claim_number FROM Customers JOIN Policies ON Customers.id = Policies.customer_id JOIN Claims ON Customers.id = Claims.customer_id
SELECT Agents.name, Agency.name, Agency.region FROM Agents JOIN Agency ON Agents.id = Agency.agent_id
